ComicInfo.Summary: It is a world much like our own-and a world in the throes of great change, shaken by the appearance of individuals that are more than human. The first of these new humans was Jeff Carey-who decided to use his abilities for the betterment of mankind. Because of this choice, his family was taken from him, murdered by his enemies. Now, he's been reborn as a figure of darkness and revenge. Now, he is trapped inside a maximum security prison with an army of killers-many of whom he put there. Or are they trapped inside with HIM? Be there for the shocking climax-and learn his true objective in storming the prison single-handed! Plus: How did he get his powers in the first place?
